title: 区块错误
author: aoyue
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

Time: 6/18/18 5:22 PM
Description: Getting block

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -3328

replies.author: 水杉
replies.txt_content:
在config里面找到forge.cfg文件 
把这两个修改一下改成true默认是false
removeErroringEntities=true
removeErroringTileEntities=true
然后重启服务器试试看
